name: bitcoin-image
description: Library for handling blockchain-based image protocols (b://, ord://, bitfs://, etc.)

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --minify --sourcemap --outfile index.js && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --minify --sourcemap --outfile index.cjs && bun build src/react.tsx --outdir dist --target node --format esm --minify --sourcemap --outfile react.js --external react && bun build src/react.tsx --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --minify --sourcemap --outfile react.cjs --external react && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.dev: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --outfile index.js --watch

author: Satchmo
